Player History
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1966, hitting .520 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 9/2/1966 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Hit 3 homeruns against Los Angeles, driving in 3 runs on 5/8/1967...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1967, hitting .520 with 0 HR, 1 RBI...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Pittsburgh on 4/12/1968...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 5/31/1968 (Going to CHC: LF R. Zisk, P P. Borbon Sr.. Going to NYM: P B. Lee, CF L. Brock, P S. Shea)...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1969...
Hit for the cycle against Chicago (N) on 5/24/1970...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/27/1972, off Larry Maxie (CIN)...
